phrases: They threw my gym clothes in the garbage.
You are right, I remember that now.
Everyone is having so much fun.
I hate people in cliques, too.
Because it made me feel like I was getting excluded for no good reason.
Because it felt like everyone was pointing out how isolated I was.
I hated teachers, too, because they made us work in groups,
I especially hated special events at school.
Thinking back on those days, I cannot remember a single thing I did not hate.
You should probably hold off on dying.
Wait a little longer and you will make a friend.
You will also meet a tall guy who is kind and a girl who is friendly,
and a kind of-cowardly student council president and his little posse.
Lots of people will want to be friends with you.
but you will meet someone who cries for you, laughs for you,
gets sad for you, gets mad for you, and scolds you when you need scolding.
She is waiting for you, I promise.
What was I just dreaming about?
The boy I love is really weak.
He does not actually like yelling at people.
He will laugh about being unathletic,
when really, he wishes he was not.
Boys and girls alike all fawn over him,
but every now and then, it makes him feel anxious.
There is so much he struggles with, and I love him so much.
There is so much he struggles with, and I love him so much.
Sengoku-kun, get it, I am scared!
His expression screams I am scared, too!
The boy I love is weak, but he tries really hard.
back when we met, he was a totally different person.
Man, I have such a crush on Ayasaki.
Her face is so tiny and cute, you know?
She is so hard to approach, though.
Like, she thinks she is too good for us.
Probably'because she knows all the guys have the hots for her.
Out of all the girls, Ayasaki and Kono really stick out.
They are like Beauty and the Beast.
What were you reading in class just now?
Oh, that is not the name of the book.
Do you like to read, too, Ayasaki-san?
Not during class, but yeah, I like reading.
I brought these for you to borrow.
I brought these for you to borrow.
There are a bunch of stories in there, so hopefully you will find one you like.
That will be a fun read, Remi.
Oh, do you like books like these, too, Kono-san?
Then you can borrow them after Ayasaki-san.
I really like the third story in the collection.
How many books do you own?
We have a whole room full of them at my house.
Oh, do not worry; I will not be weird about it or anything!
Wow, you really do have a whole roomful!
Wow, you really do have a whole roomful!
We have not cleaned in here much, so watch out for the dust.
I should not have touched without asking.
I just wanted to see this one book.
The day before the world ends, I think?
Is it the whole world, or just Japan that gets destroyed?
Think it is the whole world.
If you knew the world was going to end tomorrow,
you probably would not feel like doing much of anything, huh?
I would want to blow through all my money.
And I would load up on desserts, too.
You are spending your last day on Earth eating dessert?!
There are tons I have never tried!
Are your pigtails up higher today?
Y-Yeah, I just felt like it.
If you are cute, you can do whatever, you will still be cute!
Guess you do not understand where I am coming from, though, Sengoku-kun.
Thanks for lending these to me!
You did not have to rush through them.
They were so good, I ended up on a reading binge.
Man, though, I really would not want the world to end tomorrow!
What about all those desserts, though?
The end of the world is no time for desserts!
Kamioka has a crush on you, Ayasaki-san.
Hey, can I go over to your place again today, Sengoku-kun?
Just, I know you are used to talking to guys, Ayasaki-san,
but I might get the wrong idea about your intentions.
You will like this series, Ayasaki-san.
It is long, but totally worth the read.
Cannot wait to read it, then.
What if the world was going to end tomorrow?
Oh, you mean like that book?
I mean, kind of, but... sure.
I would tell you I liked you.
Then I would turn to space dust.
I am not embarrassed at all!
Thanks for letting me borrow it.
Thanks for letting me borrow it.
You finished it in just one day?!
I finished studying early, so I had some extra time.
What did you think of this bestselling tearjerker?
He cried while reading it last night.
When we met, he did not get swept away by those around him.
And I love who he is now, too.
His weak points, the fact that he cannot lie, how hard he tries-
So... why the sudden urge to give me a manicure?
Well, I was cleaning my room and found some unopened bottles.
I thought this color'd look good on you.
I should not, but I want to.
I thought if I stepped on you...
I would get enough EXP to level up.
You are always messing with me, so I figured I would try messing with you today!
It is okay, I am not, like, mad.
I am just kind of surprised.
Plus, like, you are always going off on Shindo-kun and Sawada-san,
but when you are with me, you are so calm and well-mannered,
so are you, like, faking it for me?
No, this is the real me, I promise.
I mean, would you rather I yelled at you and hit you instead?
Who the hell d'ya think you are talking to, bitch?!
Actually, that is kind of hot.
you still listening to this, Iura?
I mean, it is all bangers, but damn.
Could I please borrow your Math B textbook?
I got no clue what is going on!
What is up with you today, Miyamura?
What is up with you today, Miyamura?
I am guessing this is something Her Highness the Ice Queen wanted you to do.
If you do not want to do this, then you should tell her.
I am begging you, Ishikawa-kun, get it together!
Guess I will never get to see you get all violent with me, then.
Well, I will just wait for you to forget, then give it a try.
Wait, I do not think the physics room is open during lunch.
Oh, I think you are right!
Ugh, I will drop these off after lunch.
Just tell our teacher I will be late.
Is now the time to try that?
Who the hell do you think you are talking to, you frickin' airhead?!
Stop actin' like we are all buddy-buddy,because we are not!
Hori-san, I really cannot do this!
That is the last time I am going to yell at you.
And now they are all talking about how we were fighting in the AV room.
I feel bad for freaking out the underclassmen.
W-Well, I have to go turn him down!
I do not even know him.
He looked, like, really serious, too.
I just feel bad going up to him with only a Sorry, no dice!
Why do not you have someone pretend to be your boyfriend?
I do not think he would, as long as you explained what is going on.
Yeah, it is happening after school.
So, what do you want me to do?
Just kind of feel her up while she turns him down.
I cannot do him dirty like that!
So what class is he in?
You sure you want to use me for this?
Would not you want, like, a way hotter guy to pull this off?
W-Well, you are definitely a little hotter than him, so it is fine!
Should not we head out already?
I want to see who it is!
I want to see who it is!
I want to see who it is!
I forget who is even in Class 6.
Yeah, hard to remember when they are not in your class.
You do not have to say anything, Toru.
Sorry for making you go along with all this.
Let me say just one thing to him, then.
Y-You just have to pretend to be my boyfriend, you know!
I cannot hear what they are saying.
I am so sorry I am late, Yoshikawa-san!
Our teacher needed me for something.
He is a zillion times hotter than Toru!
I am Akane Yanagi from Class 6.
God, even his name is cool!
Miyamura's the pretty guy in our group, and even he pales in comparison!
I am genetically inferior on every level!
Hell, if he asked me out, I would say yes!
I guess that is that, then.
I mean, Ishikawa- kun is a lot more attractive than me.
Why did you turn him down?!
Oh... he is kind of too hot, you know?
And I am not into like, fancy, expensive food and stuff.
God, for a second there, I thought I would just died on the spot.
I had no idea we had someone like that in our grade.
He is super hot and totally hilarious.
Oh, I have not bought a new pair yet...
But I am okay, I do not need them that-
I think you might have had the wrong girl.
S-So there is this friend of mine, Kyoko Hori.
She is way taller than me, and way prettier than me, too.
A-Are you sure you did not mean to ask her out?
Oh, I am guessing you heard how bad my eyes are, huh...
I did not have the wrong person.
I have liked you for quite a while.
So I know what you look like,
but I do not know who this Hori-san girl is you are talking about.
We were just talking about you.
Yoshikawa-san said she had an attractive female friend...
I am so sorry, uh... Miyamura-kun!
I just happened to run into Yoshikawa-san here!
I was not trying anything funny, I... huh?
-I swear, nothing funny was happening here, really!
-I swear, nothing funny was happening here, really!
